attributes.action: Save the One O'Clock Club, Peckham Rye
attributes.additional_details: We want the Peckham Rye One O'Clock Club to remain open. It's a valuable community centre for our children to socialise and develop and for parents, nannies and guardians to meet. With so many children in Southwark where else can your children play safely and for free with all the necessary amenities? Save our One O'Clock Club from closure.
